description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Blast your way through THE classic space shooter with a minty fresh smell of tomorrow!  Unique styling, global highscores, and a punch up the thorax for aliens across the universe!
